channel.title: Need help, This is weird! look
channel.description: I need help i want to upload my client and its normal 17mb but when i do it to rar. file so i can upload it then it says its 3mb.. and ppls cant open it and run it =\

item.title: Need help, This is weird! look
item.dc:creator: @adventurescape adventurescape
item.description:
@adventurescape wrote:

yeah, if the .rar doesnt want to exract your file for you, right click your desktop, click new click a new compressed zip folder/file, rename is to owner naders client, etc. and then drag your client into the .zip folder, it will make a copy of ur client and ur computer will put it onto ur .zip file, then you can use megaupload, plunder, cheatengine, uppit, megashare, mediafire, or other uploading sites and upload your .zip file there, a .zip file is easier than a .rar file because every single computer can exract a .zip file, if u want to exract a .rar file, u must download winrar ;D

            ~AdventureScape

Read full topic

item.title: Need help, This is weird! look
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

Rar it yourself and see if you can open it. If not, compress it as a zip. If you can open it, then the other people need WinRAR.
